backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining Nakshatra calculations, user profile data, logging structures, and access‑controlled storage maps with helpers for degree validation and lunar day computations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files describing UI structure, hooks, components, and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Inter font and mounting the React app with a dark theme class.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React router setup with themed layout, defining routes for Today, Tomorrow, Knowledge, Nakshatra detail, History, and Profile pages.
frontend/src/components/alerts/AlertsTog: UI toggle for enabling or disabling Nakshatra alerts using a custom bell glyph.
frontend/src/components/alerts/Nakshatra: Dismissible banner that announces detected Nakshatra changes with tone‑shift messaging.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and automatic recovery for duplicate sessions.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper component that restricts content to authenticated users, showing a sign‑in card when unauthenticated.
Modal UI for selecting a city or using geolocation, including search, error handling, and updating current city.
frontend/src/components/glyphs/Glyph.tsx: Renders various SVG glyph icons based on a type prop.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation bar with links, city picker trigger, alerts toggle, and login button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, routed content outlet, and footer including version info.
frontend/src/components/nakshatra/Naksha: Card-style link displaying basic nakshatra info like name, number, symbols, and ruler.
Detailed multi-section display of nakshatra symbolism, traits, themes, and related info.
frontend/src/components/nakshatra/Transi: Calculates and displays next pada and nakshatra transition times based on current city timezone.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyGuida: Accordion modules showing daily guidance content for a given nakshatra with glyph icons.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyInter: Displays daily interpretation text for a selected nakshatra using card sections for emotional, mental, social, and rhythm themes plus a narrative block.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyLogsP: Provides forms for daily check-ins, sleep logs, and dream logs, saving entries via user log mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/today/ResonanceS: Shows whether the current nakshatra resonates with the user's birth chart and displays related messages.
frontend/src/data/cities.ts: Exports a list of major cities with timezones and coordinates for location selection or geolocation use.
Defines daily content descriptions for each nakshatra, including emotional tone, themes, and guidance.
frontend/src/data/nakshatras.ts: Provides structured metadata for all nakshatras, including traits, symbols, ruling deities, and padas.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor based on authentication state, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorInitStatus.ts: Reads actor query status from the cache and exposes loading, success, and retry utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useCitySelection.ts: Manages selected city with validation, localStorage sync, and live local time updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity auth, including login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Custom hook for reactive localStorage with cross-tab and same-tab synchronization.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraAlerts.ts: Tracks nakshatra changes and shows an alert banner when the current nakshatra differs from the last seen.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraNow.ts: Computes current lunar longitude by city and fetches current nakshatra with polling and validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps react-query to call actor.determineNakshatra with validation and actor initialization checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserLogs.ts: Provides queries and mutations for reading and writing user logs linked to an actor backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and updates user profile and birth chart data via actor-backed queries and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base theme with light/dark CSS variables and typography styles.
frontend/src/lib/appVersion.ts: Exports a constant string for the application version.
frontend/src/lib/astro/lunarLongitude.ts: Computes an approximate lunar longitude using a simplified mean‑motion formula normalized to 0–360 degrees.
frontend/src/lib/diagnostics/nakshatraDi: Provides diagnostic logging and helpers for validating and normalizing lunar longitudes.
frontend/src/lib/insights/dreamThemeExtr: Extracts per‑nakshatra dream themes by counting entries and pulling non‑stopword keywords.
frontend/src/lib/insights/nakshatraInsig: Generates up to three user insights based on repeated check‑ins, analyzing energy, mood, and restlessness patterns by nakshatra.
frontend/src/lib/nakshatra/index.ts: Exports helpers to generate nakshatra slugs and look up nakshatras by slug.
frontend/src/lib/time/timezone.ts: Handles timezone‑aware date formatting and conversion, producing Date objects representing local times in specified zones.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryInsightsPage.t: Fetches user logs and displays insights, history, and dream themes within a tabbed interface.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBasePage.tsx: Displays searchable list of all nakshatras in the knowledge base.
frontend/src/pages/NakshatraDetailPage.t: Shows detailed information for a single nakshatra based on its slug.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSettingsPage.t: Provides authenticated profile management including user info and birth chart settings.
frontend/src/pages/TodayPage.tsx: Displays the current nakshatra with hooks for location, identity, and backend status, showing error and retry states when data cannot be fetched.
frontend/src/pages/TomorrowPage.tsx: Calculates tomorrow’s lunar longitude and queries the backend for the next day’s nakshatra, handling invalid longitude and actor initialization errors.
frontend/src/pages/VisualStyleSystemPage: Empty placeholder page for visual style system content.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, typography, container settings, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current issues and required fixes related to Today page blocking bugs and actor initialization behavior.
